00033 /* S3 list elements in `splittingNode's */
00034 #define S3_NODEID               0    /* nodeID */

00036 #define S3_CRITERION            2    /* criterion */
00037 #define S3_TERMINAL             3    /* terminal */

00039 #define S3_SSPLIT               5    /* ssplit */

00042 #define S3_RIGHT                8    /* right */

00044 #define NODE_LENGTH             10   /* 9 elements in total */
00045

00050 #define CRITERION_LENGTH        3    /* 3 elements in total */
00051
